bibl.title: Letter from W. Branks Stewart to Philip Showalter Hench, December 1, 1941

div1.p: Stewart encloses an illustration of the bas-relief of "The Conquest of Yellow Fever," from Louisiana State University School of Medicine.

div1.head: Letter from W. Branks Stewart to Philip Showalter Hench, December 1, 1941
div1.opener:
LOUISIANA STATE UNIVERSITY COLLEGE
OFFICE OF THE DEAN
LOUISIANA STATE UNIVERSITY
SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
NEW ORLEANS
December 1, 1941
Dr.Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Doctor Hench:
div1.p:
I received your letter of November 26
and am enclosing herewith the only illustra-
tion of the bas-relief of The Conquest of
Yellow Fever that we have made.

I trust this will serve your purpose.
If not, let me know and I shall be glad to
furnish you with a print, as we have the
negative on file.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, W. B. Stewart, Director
Department of Medical Art WBS:e
